page.title: 05ECOLOGY.
page.content: The ecology of the area is very rich and varied.There are many patches of woodland of all types, from the dense natural woodland on the southern extension of {Pim Hill}in the north east of the block,to the sparse scrubby woodland around {Plex, }which is known as{Pigeon's Rough,}in the centre of the block. Although most of the area is intesively farmed there are some very interesting ecological sites.One in particular is a project to reclaim an over grown pool in {Preston Gubbals.} The pool is on the west side of the main {A538}at the junction with the road into {Preston Gubbals }village. Old trees have been felled and new broadleaved varieties planted, the pool cleared,rank vagitation cut back and controlled.
